item.title: I’m Nearly 30, but This Is My First Love
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description:
“Inoue-san, you’re my first boyfriend…”, says Yamamoto, 28 years old. “I don’t have a lot of experience either, but we’ll work through it together”, says Inoue, 32 years old. In reality, Inoue’s never been with a girl either, but he couldn’t tell Yamamoto that. A fluffy love-comedy about the adventures of this innocent and pure...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded:
“Inoue-san, you’re my first boyfriend…”, says Yamamoto, 28 years old.
“I don’t have a lot of experience either, but we’ll work through it together”, says Inoue, 32 years old.
In reality, Inoue’s never been with a girl either, but he couldn’t tell Yamamoto that.
A fluffy love-comedy about the adventures of this innocent and pure couple.
